title: The Shadow Within | Zed Montage

embed.description: Hi guys! YASHIMI here with my very first Zed montage. Give me any advice you see fit to help me improve in the future! Make sure you like, comment and subscribe! But most importantly, enjoy! Music: Urbanstep - Sunrise [Dubstep]

body: Hi guys! This is my very first Zed montage and I would like feedback please! What I did good on and what I need improvement on would be really handy! Also if you liked it, hit the like button and subscribe to me for more content ;D

replies.body: False prophet I shall not watch your vile content I only follow the tellings of the one true Zed god vNutz!
Have you ever heard of a man named SuperSkitzzo? He has the most games played with Zed in OCE.
I'm not a zed god. Just another player ;)
im getting back into zed, i might be able to help give u some footage :)

Here are some pointers:
The intro is too cliche, make it different than a different angles of the map and zed.
Zed plays are mediocre but I cannot blame you because making GOOD and NEW zed plays are hard.
<sidenote> The first clip you could've just did a w q e thunderlord proc and that should've killed him but then again nice ult dodge. Also unnecessary flash afterwards
These were more of misplays from the enemy, but then again its still fun to watch.
WAY to much time on Maokai's death. Could've snuck in another clip.
Vayne clip was pretty good but you should've q'd a bit earlier to get a triple kill and a guarenteed death.
Zed picture was a good addition but was pointless. Put it like between 2 clips to make a better transition.
SO MUCH SLO MO. Try and not slow mo everything otherwise it stretches on too long and people will get bored.

Well that is all I can think of. For a first zed montage its pretty good.

Thanks for taking the time to give me these tips! The zed plays were only  from 3 games so they weren't the best quality. Next time i'll spent more time looking for better plays. 

That's a lot of good tips :D I'll make sure to make my next montage much much better!
